nodes.text: I Am a Bounty Hunter is a children's book released in October, 2002 by Random House. Written by Kerry Milliron, the book is told from Boba Fett's point of view starting in 22 BBY.

Learn more about one of the most secretive characters in the Star Wars saga. Find out about Boba Fett straight from the source, as the bounty hunter narrates this 24-page book explaining his origins and future. I Am a Bounty Hunter by Boba Fett, is "told to" author
Kerry Milliron.
